text: The 2010 Italian Athletics Championships () was the 100th edition of the Italian Athletics Championships and were held in Grosseto from 30 June to 1 July. ==Champions== {| class="wikitable" width=60% style="font-size:90%; text- align:center;" |- !Event !!Men !!Women |- |- |100 m||align=left|Simone Collio ||align=left|Manuela Levorato |- |200 m||align=left|Roberto Donati ||align=left|Giulia Arcioni |- |400 m||align=left|Marco Vistalli ||align=left|Libania Grenot |- |800 m||align=left|Lukas Rifesser ||align=left|Antonella Riva |- |1500 m||align=left|Gilio Iannone ||align=left|Elisa Cusma |- |5000 m||align=left|Stefano La Rosa ||align=left|Federica Dal Ri |- |10,000 m||align=left|Daniele Meucci ||align=left|Claudia Finielli |- |3000 m||align=left|Yuri Floriani ||align=left|Valentina Costanza |- |100 m hurdles||align=left|Stefano Tedesco ||align=left|Marzia Caravelli |- |400 m hurdles||align=left|Giacomo Panizza ||align=left|Manuela Gentili |- |High jump||align=left|Filippo Campioli ||align=left|Antonietta Di Martino |- |Pole vault||align=left|Giorgio Piantella ||align=left|Elena Scarpellini |- |Long jump||align=left|Andrew Howe ||align=left|Tania Vicenzino |- |Triple jump||align=left|Fabrizio Donato ||align=left|Simona La Mantia |- |Shot put||align=left|Andrea Ricci ||align=left|Chiara Rosa |- |Discus throw||align=left|Hannes Kirchler ||align=left|Laura Bordignon |- |Hammer throw||align=left|Nicola Vizzoni ||align=left|Silvia Salis |- |Javelin throw||align=left|Roberto Bertolini ||align=left|Zahra Bani |- |10 km/5 km walk road||align=left|Alex Schwazer ||align=left|Sibilla Di Vincenzo |- |4X100 relay||align=left|C.S. Aeronautica (Riparelli-Berdini-Manenti-Di Gregorio) ||align=left|G.S. Forestale (Spacca-Grillo-Arcioni G.-Giovanetti) |- |4X400 relay||align=left|C.S. Carabinieri (Turchi-Salvucci-Marin-Galletti) ||align=left|Fondiaria SAI Atletica (Gervasi-Grange-Battaglia-Piangerelli) |} ==References== == External links == * Italian Athletics Federation Italian Athletics Championships Athletics Category:Italian Athletics Outdoor Championships
